alert.note: Alert for Chaves; Roosevelt (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 26 at 5:58PM MDT until September 26 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Roosevelt County in east central New Mexico... Northeastern Chaves County in southeastern New Mexico... * Until 630 PM MDT. * At 558 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crossroads, or 22 miles north of Tatum, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milnesand. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
